When do you have to notify public space authorities about bulky waste?

Published: July 26, 2025

Many people don’t know that sometimes junk removal must be reported – especially if you place waste on public property.

When is reporting mandatory?

  • If you place a large amount of junk on sidewalks or parking spots
  • If you do it outside the municipal schedule
  • If you hire a private hauler (like Dzsoni 😎)

What are the risks of not reporting?

  • Fines starting from 30,000 HUF
  • Junk might be removed at your cost
  • You’ll be in trouble if someone snitches

Dzsoni’s tip

Always check with your local government if you need a permit. If you hire us, let us know in advance – we’ll help with the paperwork too!

Dzsoni drops the truth:

“Junk ain't funny – and fines even less.” – Zsákos Dzsoni
